attributes.additional_details: Young people in the UK are suffering economically because of the amount of immigrants entering our country, both legally and illegally. Over 1 million young people are out of work. Alan Travis 'The figures for the first year of the coalition government showed that net migration actually rose from 235,000 to 250,000 in their first 12 months in office.' We currently have NO control over our borders. I'm not saying that we stop immigration, we CONTROL it. There are some genuine people wanting to come to the UK too, who will contribute to our society.
